price: Lakini nyinyi mliwakejeli hata wakakusahaulisheni kunikumbuka, na mlikuwa mkiwacheka.
arabic: فَٱتَّخَذۡتُمُوهُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوۡكُمۡ ذِكۡرِي وَكُنتُم مِّنۡهُمۡ تَضۡحَكُونَ
footnotes: Na nyinyi daima mlikuwa mkiwafanyia maskhara, mpaka maskhara yenu yakakusahaulisheni kunikumbuka Mimi na kuniabudu Mimi. Basi hamkuamini wala hamkut'ii. Nanyi mlikuwa mkiwacheka kwa kejeli.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-ittakhadhtumūhum sikh'riyyan ḥattā ansawkum dhik'rī wakuntum min'hum taḍḥakūna
